mapper.insert: insert into weizu_oa_employee( user_id, name, nick_name, mobile, remark, create_time, modify_time ) values ( #{userId}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{mobile}, #{remark}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update weizu_oa_employee set modify_time=now(), name = #{name}, nick_name = #{nickName}, latitude = #{latitude}, mobile = #{ mobile}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.id, t.name as name, t.nick_name as nickName, t.mobile as mobile, t.remark as remark, t.user_id as userId, t.create_time as createTime, t.modify_time as modifyTime from weizu_oa_employee as t

select t.id as employeeId, t.name as userName, t.nick_name as nickName, t.mobile as mobile, t.remark as remark, t.user_id as userId, wu.avatar_url as headImage from weizu_oa_employee as t inner join weizu_oa_employee_team as et on t.id = et.employee_id left join weizu_user as wu on t.user_id = wu.id where et.team_id = #{teamId}
